alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 5:59PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington, south central Baker and northeastern Malheur Counties through 745 PM MDT/645 PM PDT/... At 659 PM MDT/559 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brosman Mountain, or 21 miles west of Weiser, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brosman Mountain around 700 PM MDT. Farewell Bend State Park around 610 PM PDT. Indian Head Mountain around 720 PM MDT. Weiser around 740 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
